title: Silence speaks: digital storytelling project
creator_contributor_role: Center for Digital Storytelling US, production company
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Family violence
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Interpersonal conflict
abstract: Short personal narratives exploring themes of domestic violence and abuse
description: The content has been created as part of the "Silence Speaks" project, an international movement that provides the survivors of violence and abuse with an opportunity to tell their own stories. A co-production between ACMI and Center for Digital Storytelling (US) to coincide with Real Life on Film. "Silence Speaks" represents the most recent examples of Australian documentary making.
